document.full_text: ford motor co and u.s. safety regulators have agreed to a greatly expanded recall of the best-selling vehicle in north america, the ford f-150 pickup truck, the regulators said on thursday.
document.title: ford f-150 recall greatly expanded: safety regulators
lines_and_colors: ford motor co and u.s. safety regulators have agreed to a greatly expanded recall of the best-selling vehicle in north america, the ford f-150 pickup truck, the regulators said on thursday.
